name: Death of a Dream Quiz | DC Comics | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is the next planet Lemnos plans to destroy?
questions.explanation:
Colu.

	Colu is home to a race of very intelligent beings. Brainiac 5 is a particularly intelligent member of this race, and he arrives to find that the intelligence of the inhabitants has been taken away.

questions.text: There is a split in the Legion's ranks. Whom do the rebels choose to follow?
questions.explanation:
Brainiac 5.

	Cosmic Boy orders a raid on Brainiac 5's laboratory because he won't willingly share his research with the rest of the Legion. This upsets Brainiac and serves as a breaking point for the tension between the two of them.

Sun Boy.

	Sun Boy never wanted to be a Legionnaire, even though he serves as field leader. Unlike many others, his parents are supportive of the Legion and even brought the Legion some cookies!

questions.text: Which Legionnaire infiltrates a slave-trading ship?
questions.explanation:
Colossal Boy.

	An alien named Phyir promises to get kids into the Legion, but instead sells them into slavery. His operation is stopped by the efforts of Colossal Boy, a giant who can shrink to six feet. Element Lad also helps out.

questions.text: Cosmic Boy finds out that his homeworld of Braal is seceding from the United Planets. How long does he have to get back home?
questions.explanation:
Six hours.

	Cosmic Boy packs his things and leaves, but changes his mind at the last moment. His family eats without him as he returns to the Legion.

questions.text: Most of the suicide bombers plant themselves in Legion Plaza.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Several suicide bombers loyal to Lemnos planted themselves in the Legion Plaza where fans and supporters of the Legion had willingly gathered. Mass panic lead to more casualties than normal. One bomber somehow got inside Legion tower and freed Elysion, who had been taken prisoner.

questions.text: The captured Elysion, second in command to Lemnos, escapes and causes mass havoc. Which Legionnaire is crushed by rubble?
questions.explanation:
Dream Girl.

	Dream Girl has precognitive visions and dreams. She had once claimed that she and Brainiac would be married, and it is Brainiac 5 himself who stores her body in his laboratory, looking for a way to revive her.

questions.text: Which Legionnaire is singled out for attack when a squad is dispatched to the fifth dimension?
questions.explanation:
Saturn Girl.

	Nothing makes sense in the fifth dimension; anything can happen!Thus it's not at all surprising when Saturn Girl suddenly uses Lightning Lad's powers. Saturn Girl is a telepath hailing from Titan, one of Saturn's moons.

questions.text: Which miniature Legionnaire deals a crippling blow to Elysion?
questions.explanation:
Atom Girl.

	Atom Girl prefers to be small, thus she is rarely seen. Largely considered an urban legend, she enters Elysion's bloodstream and grows to full size, exploding out of his shoulder.

questions.text: What newfound power does Princess Projectra display?
questions.explanation:
She can make illusions.

	The last surviving member of the royal family of Orando, Projectra inherited her powers upon the death of her parents. Her only power previously was the incredible wealth with which she financed the entire Legion of Super-Heroes.
